label: 伊治城
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: The region (in what is now Miyagi Prefecture) to which, in 796, 9,000 people from Sagami, Musashi, and seven other provinces are said to have been moved and established as palisade households" (sakuko) to cultivate the land there (p. 31). [Also read Koreharijō] [相模、武蔵、柵戸（きのへ）]"
